## clickText() function

Click a link, button, label, or input by its text content.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function clickText(page: Page, text: string, { timeout, checkEvery, elementXPath, extraMessage, assertSuccess, retryUntil }?: ClickTextOptions): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  page | Page | puppeteer page object. |
|  text | string | Text that the element must contain. |
|  { timeout, checkEvery, elementXPath, extraMessage, assertSuccess, retryUntil } | [ClickTextOptions](./pentf.clicktextoptions.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
